body:
I set my account to not view NSFW
I then posted something marked as NSFW
I could see the comments and everything fine

I then turned on NSFW accidentally (didn’t understand what the button on the post meant) 
I quickly turned it back off
And my own post disappeared from my history and I couldn’t view it anymore
body_html:
I set my account to not view NSFW I then posted something marked as NSFW I could see the comments and everything fine

I then turned on NSFW accidentally (didn’t understand what the button on the post meant) I quickly turned it back off And my own post disappeared from my history and I couldn’t view it anymore
title: Quirk or glitch?

body:
If you're talking about the post on +UnpopularOpinion, that one's still nsfw. Here's the link, maybe you'll be able to view it directly: https://ruqqus.com/post/yly/i-want-more-liberals-on-this

Sounds like a bug that caused your second button press to not go through.
body_html:
If you're talking about the post on +UnpopularOpinion, that one's still nsfw. Here's the link, maybe you'll be able to view it directly: https://ruqqus.com/post/yly/i-want-more-liberals-on-this

Sounds like a bug that caused your second button press to not go through.

guild.description:
This used to be a place to share, view, and track feedback for Ruqqus. Now it's pretty useless because the admins don't care. Try buttering them up on discord. They don't respond here. 

+ruqqusbugs
